thread.title: West Brom scout tracks Moses Simon
thread.title_full: West Brom scout tracks Moses Simon

author: Okogba
title: West Brom scout tracks Moses Simon
text:
Home » Sports » West Brom scout tracks Moses Simon West Brom scout tracks Moses Simon On 4:53 am In Sports by Okogba Comments 
Super Eagles star Moses Simon was watched by West Brom scout during the friendly game against Senegal last Thursday in London. 
Simon played for an hour in the Super Eagles 1-1 draw with Senegal at the Hive (home of Barnet FC). 
The 21-year-old was watched by West Brom Sporting and Technical Director Nicky Hammond, who was there to get a look at Moses who plays for Gent in Belgium. 
According to Birmingham Mail, this is not the first time West Brom are watching Simon who they have been tracking for almost a year. 
The Premier League club watched the forward during Gent’s Europa League Round of 32 clash against Tottenham. 
Simon has been impressive for Gent so far this season and has been heavily linked with a move to England at the end of the season. 
Simon kicked off his career at the famed GBS Academy in Jos before signing a pre-contract agreement with Dutch giants, Ajax. 
Despite the contract with Ajax, Simon joined Ajax partner club in Slovakia, AS Trencin. 
In January 2015, Simon joined Gent, signing a 3-year contract.
